0.question: Bikes for Tykes is having a sale. Racing bikes cost $489. Mountain bikes cost $275. You get a discount of $145 if you buy both bicycles. How much will it cost to buy both bikes?

1.question: Mr. Kroft is a mail carrier. He delivered 378 pieces of mail before lunch. He delivered 445 pieces of mail after lunch. How many pieces of mail did he deliver in all?

2.question: The concert hall has 465 seats. The orchestra had 2 sold out performances. How many people went to the concerts?

3.question: Hockey sticks are on sale. The Sport Store had 680 hockey sticks in the morning. There were only 195 hockey sticks left at the end of the day. How many hockey sticks did they sell?

4.question: 480 cans were collected during the recycling program this year. 165 fewer cans were collected last year. How many cans were collected in both years?
